Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (200 degrees Celsius). Prepare a baking sheet by lining it with parchment paper.
Combine the ingredients and mix well until dough forms. Drop spoonfuls of the dough onto the prepared baking sheet.
Bake in the oven until the tops of the muffins are golden, usually around 25 to 30 minutes.
